cast.name: 妮科尔·奥利弗 Nicole Oliver

introduction: While on a morning coffee and donut run for the team, Ant-Man discovers that someone has stolen his van that holds the Quantum Tunnel! Turns out it was Thanos and he’s partnered with Red Skull to travel back in time to recruit a powerful army of villains, including Iron Monger, Ultron, Hydra…and another Red Skull? It’s now up to Ant-Man and The Avengers to find Thanos and prevent him from changing history and destroying the world. Oh, and reclaim Ant-Man’s van, too. Avengers assemble!
